thread.title: Arsenal transfer news: Lucas Perez insists he ‘feels comfortable’ at Emirates amid shock exit reports | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal transfer news: Lucas Perez insists he ‘feels comfortable’ at Emirates amid shock exit reports | Metro News

author: Louis Sealey For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal transfer news: Lucas Perez insists he ‘feels comfortable’ at Emirates amid shock exit reports | Metro News
text:
Louis Sealey for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 10:29 pm Lucas Perez scored the opener during Arsenal’s 2-0 win over Sutton United (Picture: Getty) 
Lucas Perez insists he feels ‘really comfortable’ at Arsenal after reports suggested the Spanish striker was hoping to leave the club. 
Perez scored his seventh goal for the Gunners in the comfortable 2-0 FA Cup fifth-round win over Sutton United on Monday. Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
The start at Gander Green Lane was just his ninth in all competitions since joining from Deportivo La Coruna for around £17million. 
Perez was said to be disgruntled by the lack of opportunities under Arsene Wenger – and even considering quitting the Gunners in order to gain more regular football. 
However, the 28-year-old says he now feels settled in London and comfortable in his new surroundings. Arsenal fixtures 
Liverpool (A) – Sat 4 Mar Bayern Munich – Champions League (H) – Tue 7 Mar Lincoln – FA Cup (H) – 11/12 Mar West Brom (A) – Sat 18 Mar Manchester City (H) – Sat 1 Apr West Ham (H) – Tue 4 Apr Crystal Palace (A) – Sat 8 Apr 
‘It was still quite a change for me to get used to the English league when I moved here from Spain. Everyone needs some time to adjust,’ Perez told Arsenal Player . Gunners boss Arsene Wenger (Picture: Getty)
